thread.title: Social media goes purple for Nathalie Traller
thread.title_full: Social media goes purple for Nathalie Traller | OregonLive.com

author: Anna Marum | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Social media goes purple for Nathalie Traller
text:
Purple was Nathalie Traller's favorite color.
Nathalie, a 16-year-old Sunset High School student, died on Monday after battling a rare form of cancer. Within days, the Twitter, Facebook and Instagram feeds of those who knew her exploded in a flurry of violet.
Her friends and classmates honored her the best way they knew how: By wearing purple everything (from football jerseys and swimming suits to hair ties and Chuck Taylors) and writing notes of love for Nathalie on any available surface.
Here are some of their tributes.
